services.name: Hotel Booking and Management Service
services.description: This RESTful API facilitates booking, scheduling, and managing reservations for hospitality businesses, allowing users to search for hotels, view availability, and make bookings.

services.name: Restaurant Menu and Order Processing Service
services.description: A comprehensive service enabling restaurants to display menus, take customer orders, manage kitchen operations, and process payments efficiently and in real-time.

services.name: Leisure Activity Reservation Platform
services.description: Serves recreation providers by enabling activity reservations, ticket purchasing, and experience promotions for consumers via an intuitive interface.

services.name: Apparel Retail Stock Management Service
services.description: Supports clothing retailers in managing inventory, tracking stock levels, and streamlining the supply chain to ensure optimal customer satisfaction and operational efficiency.

services.name: Consumer Electronics Rental System
services.description: Provides users with the capability to rent household electronics, manage rental periods, and coordinate returns, fostering economic and environmentally conscious usage.
